actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 96-1044.

official_title: An original resolution relating to existing limitation on reimbursement of certain transportation, per diem, and official expenses incurred by certain Senate personnel.

summary.text: Makes moneys in the contingent fund of the Senate available to make reimbursements of expenditures for individuals selected by a Senator to serve on panels or other bodies recommending nominees for Federal judgeships or service academies, without regard to limitations on such reimbursements.

titles.title: An original resolution relating to existing limitation on reimbursement of certain transportation, per diem, and official expenses incurred by certain Senate personnel.
